category.name: Maintenance.Audit Manager
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_audit_batch_size
preference.preference_description: Specifies the number of audit records to be inserted into the database in a single batch call. The records are buffered and inserted at the end of SOA or thin client call. If the batch size is exceeded within the SOA or thin client call, then the limit number of records are written and the remaining ones are accumulated again. The default size is 5 (minimum is 1, maximum is 20).
